coordinateSystem.padding: 40px on all sides ensures nothing clips

universalPrinciples: All letters start at TOP or MIDLINE - never baseline
Vertical strokes move DOWNWARD (pull, don't push)
Horizontal strokes go LEFT to RIGHT
Only 6 letters need pencil lifts: f,i,j,k,t,x

letterCategories.tallLetters: b,d,f,h,k,l,t - stem starts at y=40 (TOP line)
letterCategories.lineFirst: b,h,k,l,m,n,p,r - start with vertical line down

criticalDistinctions.b_vs_d: b starts with LINE (bat then ball), d starts with CIRCLE (Magic C first)
criticalDistinctions.g_vs_q: g hooks LEFT, q hooks RIGHT
criticalDistinctions.m_vs_n: m has TWO humps, n has ONE hump
criticalDistinctions.h_vs_n: h has TALL stem (y=40), n starts at midline (y=100)
